thread.title: Kristen Stewart Drops F-Bomb on ‘SNL’ (VIDEO) | Variety
thread.title_full: Kristen Stewart Drops F-Bomb on ‘SNL’ (VIDEO) | Variety

author: Maane Khatchatourian
title: Kristen Stewart Drops F-Bomb on ‘SNL’ (VIDEO) | Variety
text:
Courtesy of NBC February 4, 2017 | 09:18PM PT 
The always-outspoken Kristen Stewart was a little too forthright during her “ Saturday Night Live ” opening monologue. 
The actress dropped an F-bomb at the very beginning of her hosting duties. 
“We’ve got a great show, and I totally care that I’m here because it’s the coolest f—ing thing,” she said as Kate McKinnon and Aidy Bryant looked shocked. “Oh my god, and I’m sorry and Alessia Cara is also here and I’ll never come back.” 
Watch the video below: 
— Mike Ryan (@mikeryan) February 5, 2017 
More to come.
